me.Abhigya.core.menu

Class ItemMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.menu.inventory.ItemMenu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookItemMenu, BookPageItemMenu, UpdatingItemMenu

    public class ItemMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating custom Inventory menus.
